page.title: 03SHTESHAM/HOWE EDUCATION.
page.content: :1All aspects of{EDUCATION}are undertaken away from the area. Shotesham Primary age children are taken by minibus to Stoke Holy Cross, 2 miles. Howe children travel to Brooke school. Secondary age children travel or are taken by coach to Framingham Earl High School, 5 miles. Children requiring Sixth Form College and Further Education travel to Norwich. 20% of school age children attend {PRIVATE SCHOOLS.} Adult Education classes are 5 miles distant at Framingham Earl. {LANGUAGE}Norfolk accentuated speech tends to be spoken by the older inhabitants, otherwise speech is more moderate. A great pride is taken in the Norfolk accent.
